Package liber.query.client

Interface Summary
LiberServlet This interface lists all methods implemented by the servlet LiberServletImpl.
LiberServletAsync This asynchronous interface lists all methods implemented by the servlet LiberServletImpl.
 

Class Summary
ArchiveOptionsPresenter Deprecated.  
BrowseCommand Executed when a menu item from PopupMenu is selected.
BrowsingBox Displays the full description of a resource, and enables the user to browse.
BrowsingTab BrowsingTab contains a browsing module.
ContentCommand Executed when an browsing option ('show/hide information') from a PopupMenu is selected.
CustomTabBar A horizontal bar of folder-style tabs, most commonly used as part of a com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.TabPanel.
CustomTabPanel A panel that represents a tabbed set of pages, each of which contains another widget.
DownloadCommand Executed when an 'download' menu item from a PopupMenu is selected.
ExportCommand Deprecated.  
Help Provides help by showing explanatory diagrams for various windows.
InputPopupPanel A popup panel that does not 'eat' events happening outside it
ListeningTree A tree item with a mouse listener, which notices double click events and notifies the given widget about it.
MyDialogBox A form of popup that has a caption area at the top and can be dragged by the user.
MyTab Extends VerticalPanel, parent of editing, querying and browsing tabs.
ObjectPropertyCommand ObjectPropertyCommand is initialised when a user selects an object property and elicits which or what type of objects are in the range of the property.
PopupMenu Defines the popup menu widget for the wysiwym feedback text
QueryCommand Executed when a menu item from PopupMenu is selected.
QueryResult Deprecated.  
QueryTab QueryTab displays the query building module.
ResourceTypeElicitor Shows the user the types of resource that he can deposit, and asks him to specify what he is searching for.
SummationCommand Executed when a 'show all' option is selected (to show all items in a summation).
UndoCommand Executed when a 'remove information' menu item from a PopupMenu is selected.
WysiwymCommand Executed when a menu item from PopupMenu is selected.
WYSIWYMinterface Entrypoint of the LIBER editing module
WysiwymLabel A label that, if clicked, opens a popup menu
WysiwymMenuBar A standard menu bar widget.
WysiwymMenuItem A widget that can be placed in a com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.WysiwymMenuBar.
WysiwymTab Defines the editing module
